name: High Elf
description: As a high elf, you have a keen mind and a mastery of at least the basics of magic. They are the most common and friendly of their kind, often encountered in human lands and valuing artistry and academic pursuits. Their training in both sword and spell is a remnant of ancient days when all elves were expected to defend their homes.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can’t put you to sleep.

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

traits.name: Trance
traits.description: You don’t need to sleep. Instead, you meditate deeply for 4 hours a day.

traits.name: Elf Weapon Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

traits.name: Cantrip
traits.description: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

traits.name: Extra Language
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.
